argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | riota2f.1 | |- F/_ x B |
| 2 |  | riota2f.2 | |- F/ x ps |
| 3 |  | riota2f.3 | |- ( x = B -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_nfel1 | |- F/ x B e. A |
| 5 | 1 | #P_a1i | |- ( B e. A -> F/_ x B ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_a1i | |- ( B e. A -> F/ x ps ) |
| 7 |  | #P_id | |- ( B e. A -> B e. A ) |
| 8 | 3 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( B e. A /\ x = B ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_riota2df | |- ( ( B e. A /\ E! x e. A ph ) -> ( ps <-> ( iota_ x e. A ph ) = B ) ) |
